Basic Minecraft Server

Posted by Matthew Highland on January 24, 2017 Return to Hackingtons Global

Join our basic Minecraft server and have fun building and avoiding creepers. Watch our tutorial for installing Minecraft if it is your first time. Hackingtons basic Minecraft server address: hackingtons1.mcpro.co.

Getting Started with Minecraft

To join the Hackingtons Minecraft server you must have a Mojang account and Minecraft downloaded on either a Mac or PC computer. It will not work on a Chromebook. Download and purchase the software at minecraft.net.

The server address is hackingtons1.mcpro.co.

Beginners guide to installing Minecraft

Have fun Minecrafting!
